text: Muham'mada (sallalahu alaihe vasallama) ta matra allahaka rasula hun. Unibhanda pahila pani dherai rasulaharu gujri sakeka chan. Yadi unako mrtyu huncha athava uni sahida bha'ihale bhane ke timi islamabata tatkala pharkihalchau? Ra yadi jo kohi vicalita bha'ihalcha bhane tyasale allahako kehi bigarna saktaina ra allahale krtajnaharula'i chittai ramro pratiphala pradana garnecha
